ruwine uthum esurindu mini eela mene sawane randunu rasudula thodu gana rane wuwane wajambai siri sarasawiya hama dine sobane kana katapath yuwala wilasine namakala satha hale sihile sapa silili biya sena rupu kale thumule dena no kali nalalatha giri thele sunile rasinipili surarada debamale ganale siri kiyali sathuru sura anduru eka pahara duru kala mithuru thambauru wana nirathuru pubudu kala athuru thusara sinduwana dakumen pahala lahiru sirin dilihini himi neth sangala yasagana kala thana thana sidanganan sadi nolanga e himi digu thungu nahayata worandi samanga radun dewiyan sewumin nisadi muraga aho mini kalama wehesa windi sirisara hingul wila se hasa walew gana surawara salela ratha lawanatha dala dulana manahara sanda wala pela kelawara penena pahasara la sanda yuwalak athnam emena kana mini walalu nangi ras mal kanathi mana digu angili nawa thambaa la palu athi dana kamathi dena palambaatha e surapathi dina dimuthu athu siri sura thura pawathi pana sene sasinindu mandalasa balma gana nimahamew dewangana neth kalma nana surindu pululura siri sanda alma nuna kelana galathala wani indu nilma lakulu pululukulu wata bima esura wiru weralu mini kalum patharin mewula’ thuru nabulu sonduru sasilitu watora rambaa thuru babalu sisil isina wilasa siri daru wandana suran kirulaga ruwana kalumena bandana komala lathu wilasala rathin mana mandana bawin siyapatha e himi pathulena biyena la thambaa ho palu sadisi wewulana wesesin pahan pahasara gambauru piwithuru baluwan alum karawana yalidu biyakaru siripin ruwan piri e surindu sayura yuru muwekin kiya nimawiya hakida ru siru?
ma nam yuddhaya nima wu aakaraya gana athishaya kanagatu wemi.

api mathupita janawasa haduwe naththe eewa numbaalata penena nisa.handata gihin adiyak harala jiwin na kiyana umbaalata kilomitar ganak yatin inna pitasakwala jiwin hinawenawa.namuth dan mathupita janawasa idi karana kalayayi.me grahaloka nawayama yam dineka oriyan thumage nayakathwaya yatathata path wenawa.antharsakwala thulata piwisimata umbaalata wasara 500kwath inna wenawa.eekata oona manasika pasubima na.eeka api hadanawa.ee wagema pitasakwala jiwinta obala gaurawa kala yuthuyi.owun aatha kaleka obala dewiyan lesa dutu ayayi.
meka kanadawe witharak neweyi, loke diyunu ratawal godaka ehemayi.
mehi kala adhyakshanaya saha wedika nirmana rachanaya samo hun wisin sidu karana ladi.

sira bharaye sitiyath kisidu karadarayak nathi bawath itha ikmanin shri lankawata ena bawath risana kiwa” yayi da farina mahathmiya sandahan kalaya.widesha rakiya prawardhana ha subasadhaka amathi dilan perera mahatha athulu pirisak me wana witath saudi arabiyata gos athi athara ehidi risana nidahas karaganimata ethumata haki we yayi da aya wishwasaya pala kalaya.saudi arabiye sewaya karana waidyawariyaka wana kifaya isthikar mahathmiya thama diyaniyage sapaduk soya balimata nithara aya sitina sira gedarata yana athara risanata durakathanayen amathimata ho thamanta awasthawa labadimata katayuthu kirima pilibandawa ayata sthuthiwantha wana bawath farina mahathmiya pawasayi.mewara ramalan uthsawaya awasan wimath samanga aya nawatha shri lankawata ena bawath merata siyalu dena jathi aagam bhedayakin thorawa sahayogaya labadima pilibandawa sthuthiwantha wana bawath aya wadiduratath sandahan kalaya.karthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha
